data.actual_result: The third entry (created overrides) stops wrapping so the text goes off screen
data.expected_result: All audit log entries should be fully visible
data.short_description: [iPhone X] Certain audit log entries get cut off when clearing filters
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure your username is less than 7 characters long (excluding discriminator) - Go to a server you have manage permissions on - Create a category with the name "test1" - Edit the category and deny two permissions for the everyone role (e.g. connect and speak) - Create a category with the name "test2" - Open the audit log - Tap Filter, then Filter by Action, then select any action - Change the filter back to All Actions - Observe the third entry in the log
